description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Attention class! Today we'll embark on a fascinating journey the fertilization process!
This is where sperm and egg unite to create a new life. Let's see if you can identify and
sequence the key stages of this incredible event. The Challenge:
I'll provide you a set of blocks containing descriptions of the key stages of fertilization.
Your mission, is to put them in the correct order of occurrence during fertilization.
